Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Souls wander fruitlessly in the eighty-four lakhs of species of life.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He neither got envious with anyone nor did he get infatuated by any.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The lotus face of the gurmukh always remains in blossom due to continuous remembrance of the Lord.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Meeting with such persons is wonderfully delightful.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: They way of gurmukhs is devoid of mire and is accepted in the court of the Lord.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: A meeting through the wisdom of the Guru is obstruction free, true and delightful.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukhs know (very well) that human birth is a rare opportunity.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: They know in their heart of heart that within a short period this world is going to become a mound (of earth) and hence they do not develop any attachment with it.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Rarely comes a benevolent gurmukh who serves others.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Deeply pondering over the Word, a gurmukh practices truth in his life,

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He likes the truth, which resides in his heart as well as speech.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Such a gurmukh not only spruces his own life he rather gets the whole world across.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Gurmukh losing his ego and identifies his self.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Spending this life fruitfully gurmukh goes to the other world.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Repast of gurmukh is love and his delight is devoid of flirtatiousness.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukh has a tranquil heart and remains steadfast even in ups and downs.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Only gurmukhs are called to the court of the Lord and they come to the world only when the Lord sends them.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukh accomplishes the intractable and hence is called sadhu.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukh has such wisdom, which is competent to separate water from milk. This is why he is called wise.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The devotion of gurmukh is loving devotion.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK pRymw BgqI (rKdy hn ies leI) Bgq khIdy hn[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Since the gurmukhs attain divine knowledge, they are called knowledgeable ones (jnanis).

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK bRhm igAwn (dI idRStI rKdy hn XQw:-'bRhmu dIsY bRhmu suxIAY eyku eyku vKwxIAY] Awqm pswrw krxhwrw pRB ibnw nhI jwxIAY[ ' ies leI) bRhm igAwnI suBwv hY[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukhs have the wisdom fully stamped and marked by the Word.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuKW dI pUrn (ArQwq Awqm ivSYxI, iek Awqmw dy hI ivSY krx vwlI) buDI hY, sbd hI aunHW dI inSwnI hY ikauˆ jo aunHW dy vwk eISÍr sMbMDI hn, sMswrk bwxI G`t boldy hn)[

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK pauVI piq, iprm rsu mwxIAY ]15]

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Climbing the stairs of high regards, the gurmukh enjoys the delight of love of the beloved Lord.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK lok pq, dI pauVI (pRymw BgqI, AQvw jIvn mukqI pur ArUV hoey hn, ies leI 'iprm rs') ipAwry dy rs (AnMd) nUM Bogdy hn[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The true name of the creator Lord is received from the gurmukhs,

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Amidst the gurmukhs the Oankar Word is remembered.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: EAMkwr Sbd (mUl mMqR) gurmuK duAwrw iDAweIdw hY[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Amid the gurmukhs the word is pondered upon and the consciousness is merged in it,

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Living the truthful life of the gurmukhs, the truth is accomplished in life.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukh is that door of liberation through which one automatically enters his innate nature (the divine self).

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK mukqI duAwrw hY, (aus duAwrw) shj pd ivc smweIey[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He base of name (of the Lord) is attained from gurmukhs and one does not repent in the end.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Touching the philosopher's stone in the form of a gurmukh one himself becomes the philosophers stone.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK (rUpI) pwrs nUM Cohky pwrs ho jweIdw hY[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: By the glimpse only of the gurmukh, all evil passions become untouchable.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK Awp Aprs hn (Bwv iksy dw kusMg nhIˆ krdy) drs (irdy rUpI SISy) ivc (BgvMq dw drSn) krdy hn (Xw AsIˆ gurmuKW dw drSn krIey),

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Meditating upon the Lord amid the gurmukhs one loses duality.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: (iesy krky) aunHW dw bRhm ivKy hI iDAwn hY ('duibDw') dÍYq dUr kIqI hY[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the company of the gurmukhs neither the wealth and physical beauty of others is seen nor is backbiting committed.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: pr Dn, (pr iesqRI) rUp (v`l nhIˆ q`kdy qy) nw hI (iksy dI) inMdw krdy hn[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the company of gurmukhs only nectar-name in the form of Word is churned and the essence is acquired.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK AMimRq nwm dw (muKoˆ aucwr krky) gurU dy Sbd nUM irVkdy (ivcwrdy) rihMdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK hsdw jwie, AMq n roeIAY ]17]

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the company of gurmukhs the jiva (self) at last becomes happy and does not wail and weep.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK AMq kwl ivKy hsdy hoey jWdy hn[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: As a knowledgeable person, the gurmukh imparts knowledge to the world.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK pMfq hoky jgq nUM gÎwn dyˆdy hn[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Losing their ego, the gurmukhs purify their inner-self.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: Awpw Bwv gvw ky AMqhkrx SuD krdy hn[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukhs adopt truth and contentment and do not indulge in lust and anger.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK sq qy sMqoK (rKdy hn), kwm kRoD (Awid ivSy aunHW pr bl) nhIˆ (pwauˆdy)[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukhs have no enmity and opposition towards anyone.

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: gurmuK inrvYr hoky iksy nwl vYr ivroD nhIˆ r`Kdy[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Preaching to all the four varnas, gurmukhs merge in equipoise.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Blest is the mother of a gurmukh who has given birth to him and the gurmukh is the best among warriors.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukh eulogises the wondrous Lord in the form.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukhs have armour of truth which they have been gifted by the Lord.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: For gurmukhs only the beautiful highway of truth has been prepared.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Their wisdom is unfathomable and to get to it one gets perplexed.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukh is carefree in the world but not so towards the Lord.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurmukh is perfect; he cannot be weighed on any scale.

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The wisdom of gurmukhs is stable one and does not get destabilised even if done so.
